definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
luggage that has been checked in (on flight)

pinyin: xuan2 zhuan3 xing2 li5 chuan2 song4 dai4

sentences.english: B:Here they are, will you weigh all our luggage together?
sentences.chinese: 這些都是，要不要把我的全部行李一起過磅？

sentences.english: It looks like I'm missing one of my carry-ons from the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我好像在飛機上丟失了一件隨身攜帶的行李。

sentences.english: After we left our luggages in the hotel, then went to visit Tian'an men Square directly.
sentences.chinese: 我們把行李放到酒店後，就直接去參觀天安門。

sentences.english: The room ha great importould like closet. You can put your totes in it.
sentences.chinese: 房間裏有一個很大的壁櫥，你能夠把你的行李放出來。

sentences.english: May I help you with your bags, sir.
sentences.chinese: 先生，我幫您提行李好嗎？

sentences.english: Your bags are on the way up to your room .
sentences.chinese: 您的行李正在送上去給您。

sentences.english: I claimed my lost luggage at the Lost and Found.
sentences.chinese: 我在失物招領處認領了丟失的行李。

sentences.english: I left it on a rack.
The bellboy will take your bags and show you to your room .
sentences.chinese: 服務員會幫您提行李，並帶您到您的房間去。

sentences.english: As I watched her unload my luggage, I could see the sadness in her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她幫我卸着行李，而眼神裏卻滿是傷心和不捨。

sentences.english: Would you tell me where the guest comes from ?
sentences.chinese: 先生，別擔心，您的行李很快就會送上去。

sentences.english: I'm checking out now. Will you send someone for my baggage, please?
sentences.chinese: 我現在要退房，請派個人來拿我的行李好嗎？

sentences.english: We take your bags and send them in all directions。
sentences.chinese: 我們將拿走您的行李，送往四面八方。

sentences.english: They went through our luggages at the customs.
sentences.chinese: 他們在海關檢查了我們的行李。

sentences.english: May we move the luggages to the back?
sentences.chinese: 行李能拿下來放在後面嗎？

definition: luggage that has been checked in (on flight)
clothes and other items packed for traveling/baggage/luggage
to get off a plane/to deplane
